fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.semio.color

Class CIELchColorSpace

  • Object
    • ColorSpace
      • CIELchColorSpace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CIELchColorSpace
extends ColorSpace
    The polar coordinate representation of the CIE L*a*b color space.
    All the calculations are made in double precision.
    Author:
    Bertrand Dum√©nieu
    See Also:
    http://www.brucelindbloom.com/ for the equations.
    , Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CIELchColorSpace

        public CIELchColorSpace(boolean use_awt_XYZ_ColorSpace)
        Parameters:
        use_awt_XYZ_ColorSpace - : either use the AWT XYZ color space or the custom Geoxygene XYZ space to convert colors between sRGB and CIE L*c*h.
